name: Ata No.6
description:
... The doctor prescribed him twenty sessions of radiotherapy. From the third session onwards, he could no longer walk, his neck was pale and thin. His throat was constantly dry and his mouth did not saliva. In the last days, he could not even lift a glass of water  Because of this, he consumed water through a thin hose that had an end attached to the bottle, it had hard days and of course it was harder for us ...
Technique:Charcoal, silver powder and gold powder in 2006
Size:30*40cm , 12mb
from the collection of "No one will believe"
